footer.texto: Thank you for your interest in our services, we remain available for any additional information, feel free to contact us if you have any questions or comments.

3daysleft.subject: Renewing your plan
3daysleft.texto_1: Your {{PLAN}} plan will expire on {{DAYS}}. You can renew your plan by clicking the button below. Remember to backup your bots!
3daysleft.texto_2: At the end of the term, all data from your Bots and instances will be permanently deleted.

backupbots.subject: Backup of your bots
backupbots.texto_1: Your bots has been removed because your {{PLAN}} plan has ended. You can download your bots backup by clicking the buttons below. Remember that your bots can go back online with our Free plan or you can buy a new plan by clicking here.
backupbots.texto_2: You have 1 month to download your bot backup, otherwise it will be permanently deleted.
